duties_responsibilities.duty: Architect, develop, and maintain systems that support quantitative trading with a focus on data quality.
Lead and manage complex data initiatives or projects, recognizing business risk and surfacing it to key decision-makers.
Design and implement processes and tools for data quality, helping to deliver an industry best-practice solution for input data quality to production systems and quant models.
Produce stand-alone tools that can be used by other teams to automate data quality and discover faults.
Guide support and data onboarding teams to best practices, providing consultation on root-cause analysis, triage, and data architecture decisions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Management Information Systems, Business Information Systems, Mathematics, or Finance (Master's preferred)
